List jobs in registry

registry_ls.Rd

Show all jobs stored in the registry with their status and metadata.

Usage

registry_ls(registry = NULL, pattern = NULL, limit = NULL)

Arguments

registry

Path to registry (default: use paths_get("registry"))

pattern

Optional pattern to filter job names

limit

Maximum number of jobs to show

Value

Data frame of jobs

Examples

# \donttest{
# List all jobs
registry_ls()
#>              name      status             created
#> 6 script-820ff2af NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 17:02:37
#> 7      slurm-call NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 17:02:36
#> 5 script-672dd1bf NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 17:02:31
#> 1 parade-0437cda2 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:14
#> 2 parade-19fcf8de NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:11
#> 4 parade-fd40a7ff NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:08
#> 3 parade-b8a8b38a NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:05
#>                                              path
#> 6 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/script-820ff2af
#> 7      /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/slurm-call
#> 5 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/script-672dd1bf
#> 1 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-0437cda2
#> 2 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-19fcf8de
#> 4 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-fd40a7ff
#> 3 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-b8a8b38a

# List jobs matching pattern
registry_ls(pattern = "analysis_*")
#> No jobs found in registry
#> [1] name    status  created
#> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)

# List most recent 10 jobs
registry_ls(limit = 10)
#>              name      status             created
#> 6 script-820ff2af NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 17:02:37
#> 7      slurm-call NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 17:02:36
#> 5 script-672dd1bf NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 17:02:31
#> 1 parade-0437cda2 NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:14
#> 2 parade-19fcf8de NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:11
#> 4 parade-fd40a7ff NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:08
#> 3 parade-b8a8b38a NO_JOB_FILE 2025-09-11 16:43:05
#>                                              path
#> 6 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/script-820ff2af
#> 7      /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/slurm-call
#> 5 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/script-672dd1bf
#> 1 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-0437cda2
#> 2 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-19fcf8de
#> 4 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-fd40a7ff
#> 3 /tmp/Rtmp3xyEHO/parade-registry/parade-b8a8b38a
# }
